mapper.select: /*LALM0118Mapper.LALM0118_selBlackDetail*/ SELECT BLK.NA_BZPLC /*경제통합사업장코드(조합코드)*/ , BLK.REG_SEQ /*등록일련번호*/ , BLK.TRMN_AMNNO /*중도매인코드*/ , CASE WHEN MWN.SRA_MWMNNM = '***' THEN DMW.SRA_MWMNNM ELSE MWN.SRA_MWMNNM END SRA_MWMNNM /*중도매인명*/ , CASE WHEN MWN.CUS_RLNO = '***' THEN DMW.CUS_RLNO ELSE MWN.CUS_RLNO END CUS_RLNO /*앞자리실명번호(생년월일)*/ , CASE WHEN MWN.CUS_MPNO = '***' THEN DMW.CUS_MPNO ELSE MWN.CUS_MPNO END CUS_MPNO /*휴대전화번호*/ , BLK.AUC_PART_LIMIT_YN /*경매참여제한여부*/ , LOC.CLNTNM /*사업장명*/ , BLK.REG_DATE /*B/L 등록일자*/ , BLK.LIMIT_DATE /*B/L 거래제한일자*/ , BLK.REG_REASON /*B/L 등록사유*/ , BLK.MB_INTG_NO /*통합회원번호*/ , CASE WHEN MWN.DONGUP = '***' THEN DMW.DONGUP ELSE MWN.DONGUP END DONGUP /*동이상주소*/ , CASE WHEN MWN.DONGBW = '***' THEN DMW.DONGBW ELSE MWN.DONGBW END DONGBW /*동이하주소*/ FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_BLACKLIST BLK INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN MWN ON(BLK.NA_BZPLC = MWN.NA_BZPLC AND BLK.TRMN_AMNNO = MWN.TRMN_AMNNO AND BLK.MB_INTG_NO = MWN.MB_INTG_NO ) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC LOC ON(BLK.NA_BZPLC = LOC.NA_BZPLC) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MBINTG MBT ON(BLK.MB_INTG_NO = MBT.MB_INTG_NO AND MBT.DELACC_YN = '0' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BK_DORM_MWMN DMW ON(BLK.NA_BZPLC = DMW.NA_BZPLC AND BLK.TRMN_AMNNO = DMW.TRMN_AMNNO AND BLK.MB_INTG_NO = BLK.MB_INTG_NO ) WHERE BLK.NA_BZPLC = #{na_bzplc} AND BLK.REG_SEQ = #{reg_seq}

/*LALM0118Mapper.LALM0118_selBzplcLoc*/ SELECT DISTINCT NA_BZPLCLOC /* 사업장 지역코드 */ , CASE WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A31' THEN '경기/인천' /* 지역이름 */ WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A33' THEN '강원' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A41' THEN '충남' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A43' THEN '충북' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A52' THEN '울산' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A55' THEN '경남' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A54' THEN '경북' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A61' THEN '전남' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A63' THEN '전북' WHEN NA_BZPLCLOC = 'A64' THEN '제주' ELSE '' END NA_BZPLCLOC_NM FROM TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC WHERE NA_BZPLCLOC IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NA_BZPLCLOC_NM

/*LALM0118Mapper.LALM0118_selClntnm*/ SELECT NA_BZPLC /*사업장 코드*/ , NA_BZPLCNO /* 사업장 번호 */ , NA_BZPLCLOC /* 사업장 지역코드 */ , CLNTNM /* 사업장명 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC WHERE NA_BZPLCLOC = #{na_bzplcloc} ORDER BY CLNTNM
